# Startup settings schema

- [Startup settings schema](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/startup/index.md): Learn more about: Startup settings schema
- [<requiredRuntime> element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/startup/requiredruntime-element.md): Learn more about: <requiredRuntime> element
- [<startup> element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/startup/startup-element.md): Learn more about: <startup> element
- [<supportedRuntime> configuration element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/startup/supportedruntime-element.md): Learn more about: <supportedRuntime> element
